sentences.en: a bike repair kit
sentences.cn: 一套自行车修理工具

sentences.en: a drum kit
sentences.cn: 一套架子鼓

sentences.en: a kit for a model plane
sentences.cn: 一套飞机模型元件

sentences.en: a shaving kit
sentences.cn: 一套剃须用具

sentences.en: And security researchers have found ways of hacking into some kinds ofmedical devices and cars, though this still requires specialist knowledge and kit.
sentences.cn: 尽管需要专业的知识和装备，安全研究人员仍发现一些侵入某些医疗设备和汽车的方法。

sentences.en: Badly-built kit cars can be death traps.
sentences.cn: 质量低劣的组装车可能会有安全隐患。

sentences.en: Check the acidity of the soil with a test kit.
sentences.cn: 用试验器具测一下土壤的酸度.

sentences.en: Christopher is commonly known as Kit.
sentences.cn: 克里斯托弗通常被称为基特。

sentences.en: Did Kit live a single man all his days?
sentences.cn: 难道吉特一直打着光棍 吗 ?

sentences.en: Football kit relaunches are simply a way of boosting sales.
sentences.cn: 成套足球用品的重新推出仅仅是一种促销的手段。

sentences.en: Here, crew safety and kit preservation are the watchwords.
sentences.cn: 在这里，船员安全和装备的维护是常用口令。

sentences.en: I discaroled the experiences of those two years with my tropical kit.
sentences.cn: 我把这两种的经历连同热带用的工具一古脑儿甩到一边.

sentences.en: I don't like taking my kit off on screen.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢在银幕上表演裸戏。

sentences.en: I forgot my gym kit.
sentences.cn: 我忘带健身用品了。

sentences.en: I'll not detain you an instant longer, on any account , Kit.
sentences.cn: 无论怎样我不会耽搁你多久的, 吉特.

sentences.en: In spite of his mother's injunction, Kit turned sharply round to look.
sentences.cn: 不顾母亲的训令, 吉特还是伶俐地转过头去一望.

sentences.en: Sally keeps her make-up kit in her bag.
sentences.cn: 萨莉把化妆包放在手提包里。

sentences.en: The captain wants to inspect your kit.
sentences.cn: 船长想检查你的行装.

sentences.en: The kit consisted of about twenty cosmetic items.
sentences.cn: 整套工具包括大约20种化妆用品。

sentences.en: There are five pieces of luggage, not counting the medical kit.
sentences.cn: 一共5件行李, 药箱除外.

sentences.en: This furniture comes as a kit.
sentences.cn: 这是一套组合家具.

phrases.tran_cn: 酶联免疫试剂盒（Enzyme Linked Immunosorbent Assay Kit）
重复工具包；维修工具；工作服

phrases.phrase: the (whole) kit and caboodle【非正式用语】

trans.tran_cn: 衣物和装备，成套用品，配套元件
trans.tran_en: a set of tools, equipment etc that you use for a particular purpose or activity
